text: The employee shall be paid wages in accordance with applicable minimum wage laws. The company will follow all labour regulations issued by the government.
This contract is valid for a period of twelve months commencing from the date of signing. Either party may terminate this agreement with one month notice.
Employees shall work 8 hours per day and 48 hours per week. Overtime shall be compensated as per company policy.
The employee is entitled to 12 paid leaves per year along with national holidays.
The company agrees to comply with all labour laws applicable in the jurisdiction.
